android.permission-group.COST_MONEY.name: android.permission-group.COST_MONEY
android.permission-group.COST_MONEY.description: Do things that can cost you money.
android.permission-group.COST_MONEY.label: Services that cost you money

android.permission-group.MESSAGES.name: android.permission-group.MESSAGES
android.permission-group.MESSAGES.description: Read and write your SMS, email, and other messages.
android.permission-group.MESSAGES.label: Your messages

android.permission-group.SOCIAL_INFO.name: android.permission-group.SOCIAL_INFO
android.permission-group.SOCIAL_INFO.description: Direct access to information about your contacts and social connections.
android.permission-group.SOCIAL_INFO.label: Your social information

android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO.name: android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO
android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO.description: Direct access to information about you, stored in on your contact card.
android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO.label: Your personal information

android.permission-group.CALENDAR.name: android.permission-group.CALENDAR
android.permission-group.CALENDAR.description: Direct access to calendar and events.
android.permission-group.CALENDAR.label: Calendar

android.permission-group.WRITE_USER_DICT.name: android.permission-group.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY
android.permission-group.WRITE_USER_DICT.description: Add words to the user dictionary.
android.permission-group.WRITE_USER_DICT.label: Write User Dictionary

android.permission-group.BOOKMARKS.name: android.permission-group.BOOKMARKS
android.permission-group.BOOKMARKS.description: Direct access to bookmarks and browser history.
android.permission-group.BOOKMARKS.label: Bookmarks and History

android.permission-group.ACCESSIBILITY_F.name: android.permission-group.ACCESSIBILITY_FEATURES
android.permission-group.ACCESSIBILITY_F.description: Features that assistive technology can request.
android.permission-group.ACCESSIBILITY_F.label: Accessibility features

android.permission-group.BLUETOOTH_NETWO.name: android.permission-group.BLUETOOTH_NETWORK
android.permission-group.BLUETOOTH_NETWO.description: Access devices and networks through Bluetooth.
android.permission-group.BLUETOOTH_NETWO.label: Bluetooth

android.permission-group.AFFECTS_BATTERY.name: android.permission-group.AFFECTS_BATTERY
android.permission-group.AFFECTS_BATTERY.description: Use features that can quickly drain battery.
android.permission-group.AFFECTS_BATTERY.label: Affects Battery

android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTRO.name: android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTROLS
android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTRO.description: Direct access to hardware on the handset.
android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTRO.label: Hardware controls

android.permission-group.MICROPHONE.name: android.permission-group.MICROPHONE
android.permission-group.MICROPHONE.description: Direct access to the microphone to record audio.
android.permission-group.MICROPHONE.label: Microphone

android.permission-group.CAMERA.name: android.permission-group.CAMERA
android.permission-group.CAMERA.description: Direct access to camera for image or video capture.
android.permission-group.CAMERA.label: Camera

android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS.name: android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS
android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS.description: Monitor, record, and process phone calls.
android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS.label: Phone calls

android.permission-group.SCREENLOCK.name: android.permission-group.SCREENLOCK
android.permission-group.SCREENLOCK.description: Ability to affect behavior of the lock screen on your device.
android.permission-group.SCREENLOCK.label: Lock screen

android.permission-group.APP_INFO.name: android.permission-group.APP_INFO
android.permission-group.APP_INFO.description: Ability to affect behavior of other applications on your device.
android.permission-group.APP_INFO.label: Your applications information

android.permission-group.DISPLAY.name: android.permission-group.DISPLAY
android.permission-group.DISPLAY.description: Effect the UI of other applications.
android.permission-group.DISPLAY.label: Other Application UI

android.permission-group.SYSTEM_CLOCK.name: android.permission-group.SYSTEM_CLOCK
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_CLOCK.description: Change the device time or timezone.
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_CLOCK.label: Clock

android.permission-group.STATUS_BAR.name: android.permission-group.STATUS_BAR
android.permission-group.STATUS_BAR.description: Change the device status bar settings.
android.permission-group.STATUS_BAR.label: Status Bar

android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS.name: android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS.description: Lower-level access and control of the system.
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS.label: System tools

android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOO.name: android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOOLS
android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOO.description: Features only needed for app developers.
android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOO.label: Development tools

android.permission.SEND_SMS.name: android.permission.SEND_SMS
android.permission.SEND_SMS.description: Allows the app to send SMS messages. This may result in unexpected charges. Malicious apps may cost you money by sending messages without your confirmation.
android.permission.SEND_SMS.label: send SMS messages

android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESS.name: android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESSAGE
android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESS.description: Allows the app to send requests to other messaging apps to handle respond-via-message events for incoming calls.
android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESS.label: send respond-via-message events

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS
android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.description: Allows the app to receive and process SMS messages. This means the app could monitor or delete messages sent to your device without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.label: receive text messages (SMS)

android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS
android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.description: Allows the app to receive and process MMS messages. This means the app could monitor or delete messages sent to your device without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.label: receive text messages (MMS)

android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BRO.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BROADCAST
android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BRO.description: Allows the app to receive and process emergency broadcast messages. This permission is only available to system apps.
android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BRO.label: receive emergency broadcasts

android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS.name: android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS
android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS.description: Allows the app to read cell broadcast messages received by your device. Cell broadcast alerts are delivered in some locations to warn you of emergency situations. Malicious apps may interfere with the performance or operation of your device when an emergency cell broadcast is received.
android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS.label: read cell broadcast messages

android.permission.READ_SMS.name: android.permission.READ_SMS
android.permission.READ_SMS.description: Allows the app to read SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. This allows the app to read all SMS messages, regardless of content or confidentiality.
android.permission.READ_SMS.label: read your text messages (SMS or MMS)

android.permission.WRITE_SMS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SMS
android.permission.WRITE_SMS.description: Allows the app to write to SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious apps may delete your messages.
android.permission.WRITE_SMS.label: edit your text messages (SMS or MMS)

android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH
android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.description: Allows the app to receive and process WAP messages. This permission includes the ability to monitor or delete messages sent to you without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.label: receive text messages (WAP)

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.name: android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.description: Allows the app to read data about your contacts stored on your phone, including the frequency with which you've called, emailed, or communicated in other ways with specific individuals. This permission allows apps to save your contact data, and malicious apps may share contact data without your knowledge.
android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.label: read your contacts

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.name: android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS
android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.description: Allows the app to modify the data about your contacts stored on your phone, including the frequency with which you've called, emailed, or communicated in other ways with specific contacts. This permission allows apps to delete contact data.
android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.label: modify your contacts

android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.name: android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG
android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.description: Allows the app to read your phone's call log, including data about incoming and outgoing calls. This permission allows apps to save your call log data, and malicious apps may share call log data without your knowledge.
android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.label: read call log

android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.name: android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG
android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.description: Allows the app to modify your phone's call log, including data about incoming and outgoing calls. Malicious apps may use this to erase or modify your call log.
android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.label: write call log

android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.name: android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM
android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.description: Allows the app to access and sync social updates from you and your friends. Be careful when sharing information -- this allows the app to read communications between you and your friends on social networks, regardless of confidentiality. Note: this permission may not be enforced on all social networks.
android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.label: read your social stream

android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.name: android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM
android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.description: Allows the app to display social updates from your friends. Be careful when sharing information -- this allows the app to produce messages that may appear to come from a friend. Note: this permission may not be enforced on all social networks.
android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.label: write to your social stream

android.permission.READ_PROFILE.name: android.permission.READ_PROFILE
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.description: Allows the app to read personal profile information stored on your device, such as your name and contact information. This means the app can identify you and may send your profile information to others.
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.label: read your own contact card

android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.name: android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE
android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.description: Allows the app to change or add to personal profile information stored on your device, such as your name and contact information. This means the app can identify you and may send your profile information to others.
android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.label: modify your own contact card

android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.name: android.permission.READ_CALENDAR
android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.description: Allows the app to read all calendar events stored on your phone, including those of friends or co-workers. This may allow the app to share or save your calendar data, regardless of confidentiality or sensitivity.
android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.label: read calendar events plus confidential information

android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.name: android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR
android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.description: Allows the app to add, remove, change events that you can modify on your phone, including those of friends or co-workers. This may allow the app to send messages that appear to come from calendar owners, or modify events without the owners' knowledge.
android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.label: add or modify calendar events and send email to guests without owners' knowledge

android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY.name: android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY
android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY.description: Allows the app to read all words, names and phrases that the user may have stored in the user dictionary.
android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY.label: read terms you added to the dictionary

android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.name: android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY
android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.description: Allows the app to write new words into the user dictionary.
android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.label: add words to user-defined dictionary

com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.name: com.android.browser.permission.READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS
com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.description: Allows the app to read the history of all URLs that the Browser has visited, and all of the Browser's bookmarks. Note: this permission may not be enforced by third-party browsers or other applications with web browsing capabilities.
com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.label: read your Web bookmarks and history

com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HIS.name: com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS
com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HIS.description: Allows the app to modify the Browser's history or bookmarks stored on your phone. This may allow the app to erase or modify Browser data. Note: this permission may note be enforced by third-party browsers or other applications with web browsing capabilities.
com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HIS.label: write web bookmarks and history

com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.name: com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM
com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.description: Allows the app to set an alarm in an installed alarm clock app. Some alarm clock apps may not implement this feature.
com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.label: set an alarm

com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.name: com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOICEMAIL
com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.description: Allows the app to add messages to your voicemail inbox.
com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.label: add voicemail

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.name: android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Allows the app to get your precise location using the Global Positioning System (GPS) or network location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi. These location services must be turned on and available to your device for the app to use them. Apps may use this to determine where you are, and may consume additional battery power.
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.label: precise location (GPS and network-based)

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.name: android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Allows the app to get your approximate location. This location is derived by location services using network location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi. These location services must be turned on and available to your device for the app to use them. Apps may use this to determine approximately where you are.
android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.label: approximate location (network-based)

android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.name: android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.description: Create mock location sources for testing or install a new location provider. This allows the app to override the location and/or status returned by other location sources such as GPS or location providers.
android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.label: mock location sources for testing

android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA.name: android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS
android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA.description: Allows the app to access extra location provider commands. This may allow the app to to interfere with the operation of the GPS or other location sources.
android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA.label: access extra location provider commands

android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROV.name: android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER
android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROV.description: Create mock location sources for testing or install a new location provider. This allows the app to override the location and/or status returned by other location sources such as GPS or location providers.
android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROV.label: permission to install a location provider

android.permission.INTERNET.name: android.permission.INTERNET
android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows the app to create network sockets and use custom network protocols. The browser and other applications provide means to send data to the internet, so this permission is not required to send data to the internet.
android.permission.INTERNET.label: full network access

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows the app to view information about network connections such as which networks exist and are connected.
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.label: view network connections

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows the app to view information about Wi-Fi networking, such as whether Wi-Fi is enabled and name of connected Wi-Fi devices.
android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.label: view Wi-Fi connections

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows the app to connect to and disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to device configuration for Wi-Fi networks.
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.label: connect and disconnect from Wi-Fi

android.permission.ACCESS_WIMAX_STATE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_WIMAX_STATE
android.permission.ACCESS_WIMAX_STATE.description: Allows the app to determine whether WiMAX is enabled and information about any WiMAX networks that are connected.
android.permission.ACCESS_WIMAX_STATE.label: connect and disconnect from WiMAX

android.permission.CHANGE_WIMAX_STATE.name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIMAX_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_WIMAX_STATE.description: Allows the app to connect the phone to and disconnect the phone from WiMAX networks.
android.permission.CHANGE_WIMAX_STATE.label: Change WiMAX state

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH
android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows the app to view the configuration of the Bluetooth on the phone, and to make and accept connections with paired devices.
android.permission.BLUETOOTH.label: pair with Bluetooth devices

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description: Allows the app to configure the local Bluetooth phone, and to discover and pair with remote devices.
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.label: access Bluetooth settings

android.permission.NFC.name: android.permission.NFC
android.permission.NFC.description: Allows the app to communicate with Near Field Communication (NFC) tags, cards, and readers.
android.permission.NFC.label: control Near Field Communication

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.name: android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS
android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows the app to get the list of accounts known by the phone. This may include any accounts created by applications you have installed.
android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.label: find accounts on the device

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.name: android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS
android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows the app to use the account authenticator capabilities of the AccountManager, including creating accounts and getting and setting their passwords.
android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.label: create accounts and set passwords

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.name: android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.description: Allows the app to request authentication tokens.
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.label: use accounts on the device

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS
android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.description: Allows the app to perform operations like adding and removing accounts, and deleting their password.
android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.label: add or remove accounts

android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER.name: android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER
android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER.description: Allows the app to make calls to AccountAuthenticators.
android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER.label: act as the AccountManagerService

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.description: Allows the app to receive packets sent to all devices on a Wi-Fi network using multicast addresses, not just your phone. It uses more power than the non-multicast mode.
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.label: allow Wi-Fi Multicast reception

android.permission.VIBRATE.name: android.permission.VIBRATE
android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the app to control the vibrator.
android.permission.VIBRATE.label: control vibration

android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.name: android.permission.FLASHLIGHT
android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.description: Allows the app to control the flashlight.
android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.label: control flashlight

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.name: android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows the app to prevent the phone from going to sleep.
android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.label: prevent phone from sleeping

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows the app to modify global audio settings such as volume and which speaker is used for output.
android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.label: change your audio settings

android.permission.MANAGE_USB.name: android.permission.MANAGE_USB
android.permission.MANAGE_USB.description: Allows the app to manage preferences and permissions for USB devices.
android.permission.MANAGE_USB.label: manage preferences and permissions for USB devices

android.permission.ACCESS_MTP.name: android.permission.ACCESS_MTP
android.permission.ACCESS_MTP.description: Allows access to the kernel MTP driver to implement the MTP USB protocol.
android.permission.ACCESS_MTP.label: implement MTP protocol

android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST.name: android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST
android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST.description: Allows the app to control various peripherals for the purpose of hardware testing.
android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST.label: test hardware

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.name: android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO
android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows the app to record audio with the microphone. This permission allows the app to record audio at any time without your confirmation.
android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.label: record audio

android.permission.CAMERA.name: android.permission.CAMERA
android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows the app to take pictures and videos with the camera. This permission allows the app to use the camera at any time without your confirmation.
android.permission.CAMERA.label: take pictures and videos

android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSM.name: android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSMIT_LED
android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSM.description: Allows a pre-installed system application to disable the camera use indicator LED.
android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSM.label: disable transmit indicator LED when camera is in use

android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.name: android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS
android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.description: Allows the app to process outgoing calls and change the number to be dialed. This permission allows the app to monitor, redirect, or prevent outgoing calls.
android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.label: reroute outgoing calls

android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.name: android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE
android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the app to control the phone features of the device. An app with this permission can switch networks, turn the phone radio on and off and the like without ever notifying you.
android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.label: modify phone state

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.name: android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE
android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the app to access the phone features of the device. This permission allows the app to determine the phone number and device IDs, whether a call is active, and the remote number connected by a call.
android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.label: read phone status and identity

android.permission.CALL_PHONE.name: android.permission.CALL_PHONE
android.permission.CALL_PHONE.description: Allows the app to call phone numbers without your intervention. This may result in unexpected charges or calls. Note that this doesn't allow the app to call emergency numbers. Malicious apps may cost you money by making calls without your confirmation.
android.permission.CALL_PHONE.label: directly call phone numbers

android.permission.USE_SIP.name: android.permission.USE_SIP
android.permission.USE_SIP.description: Allows the app to use the SIP service to make/receive Internet calls.
android.permission.USE_SIP.label: make/receive Internet calls

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.name: android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows the app to test a permission for the SD card that will be available on future devices.
android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.label: test access to protected storage

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.name: android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows the app to write to the SD card.
android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.label: modify or delete the contents of your SD card

android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE.name: android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE
android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE.description: Allows the app to modify the contents of the internal media storage.
android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE.label: modify/delete internal media storage contents

android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.name: android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD
android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.description: Allows the app to disable the keylock and any associated password security. For example, the phone disables the keylock when receiving an incoming phone call, then re-enables the keylock when the call is finished.
android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.label: disable your screen lock

android.permission.GET_TASKS.name: android.permission.GET_TASKS
android.permission.GET_TASKS.description: Allows the app to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. This may allow the app to discover information about which applications are used on the device.
android.permission.GET_TASKS.label: retrieve running apps

android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.name: android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS
android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.description: Allows the app to perform actions across different users on the device. Malicious apps may use this to violate the protection between users.
android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.label: interact across users

android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.name: android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS_FULL
android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.description: Allows all possible interactions across users.
android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.label: full license to interact across users

android.permission.MANAGE_USERS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_USERS
android.permission.MANAGE_USERS.description: Allows apps to manage users on the device, including query, creation and deletion.
android.permission.MANAGE_USERS.label: manage users

android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS.name: android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS
android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS.description: Allows the app to retrieve detailed information about currently and recently running tasks. Malicious apps may discover private information about other apps.
android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS.label: retrieve details of running apps

android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.name: android.permission.REORDER_TASKS
android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.description: Allows the app to move tasks to the foreground and background. The app may do this without your input.
android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.label: reorder running apps

android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS.name: android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS
android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS.description: Allows the app to remove tasks and kill their apps. Malicious apps may disrupt the behavior of other apps.
android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS.label: stop running apps

android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY.name: android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY
android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY.description: Allows the app to start any activity, regardless of permission protection or exported state.
android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY.label: start any activity

android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES
android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.description: Allows the app to end background processes of other apps. This may cause other apps to stop running.
android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.label: close other apps

android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.name: android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES
android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.description: Allows the app to end background processes of other apps. This may cause other apps to stop running.
android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.label: close other apps

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.name: android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW
android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.description: Allows the app to draw on top of other applications or parts of the user interface. They may interfere with your use of the interface in any application, or change what you think you are seeing in other applications.
android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.label: draw over other apps

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.description: Allows the app to set the system wallpaper.
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.label: set wallpaper

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.description: Allows the app to set the system wallpaper size hints.
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.label: adjust your wallpaper size

android.permission.SET_TIME.name: android.permission.SET_TIME
android.permission.SET_TIME.description: Allows the app to change the phone's clock time.
android.permission.SET_TIME.label: set time

android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.name: android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE
android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.description: Allows the app to change the phone's time zone.
android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.label: set time zone

android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.name: android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR
android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.description: Allows the app to expand or collapse the status bar.
android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.label: expand/collapse status bar

android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS
android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows the app to read the sync settings for an account. For example, this can determine whether the People app is synced with an account.
android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.label: read sync settings

android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows an app to modify the sync settings for an account. For example, this can be used to enable sync of the People app with an account.
android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.label: toggle sync on and off

android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS.name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS
android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS.description: Allows an app to read the sync stats for an account, including the history of sync events and how much data is synced.
android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS.label: read sync statistics

android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBIL.name: android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBILITY
android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBIL.description: Allows the app to control the screen compatibility mode of other applications. Malicious applications may break the behavior of other applications.
android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBIL.label: set screen compatibility

android.permission.ACCESS_ALL_EXTERNAL_S.name: android.permission.ACCESS_ALL_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
android.permission.ACCESS_ALL_EXTERNAL_S.description: Allows the app to access external storage for all users.
android.permission.ACCESS_ALL_EXTERNAL_S.label: access external storage of all users

android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.name: android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.description: Allows the app to change the current configuration, such as the locale or overall font size.
android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.label: change system display settings

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description: Allows the app to modify the system's settings data. Malicious apps may corrupt your system's configuration.
android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.label: modify system settings

android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.name: android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES
android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.description: Allows the app to modify the Google services map. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.label: modify the Google services map

android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES
android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES.description: Allows the app to forcibly stop other apps.
android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES.label: force stop other apps

android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTE.name: android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTENT
android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTE.description: Allows the app to retrieve the content of the active window. Malicious apps may retrieve the entire window content and examine all its text except passwords.
android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTE.label: retrieve screen content

android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.name: android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE
android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.description: Allows the app to change the global animation speed (faster or slower animations) at any time.
android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.label: modify global animation speed

android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.name: android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY
android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.description: Allows the app to make parts of itself persistent in memory. This can limit memory available to other apps slowing down the phone.
android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.label: make app always run

android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.name: android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE
android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.description: Allows the app to retrieve its code, data, and cache sizes
android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.label: measure app storage space

android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICA.name: android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS
android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICA.description: Allows the app to modify your preferred apps. Malicious apps may silently change the apps that are run, spoofing your existing apps to collect private data from you.
android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICA.label: set preferred apps

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED
android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows the app to have itself started as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the app to slow down the overall phone by always running.
android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.label: run at startup

android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY
android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY.description: Allows the app to send sticky broadcasts, which remain after the broadcast ends. Excessive use may make the phone slow or unstable by causing it to use too much memory.
android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY.label: send sticky broadcast

android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.name: android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS
android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.description: Allows the app to mount and unmount filesystems for removable storage.
android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.label: access SD Card filesystem

android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYST.name: android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS
android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYST.description: Allows the app to format removable storage.
android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYST.label: erase SD Card

android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS.name: android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS
android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS.description: Allows the app to get information on internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS.label: get information on internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_CREATE.name: android.permission.ASEC_CREATE
android.permission.ASEC_CREATE.description: Allows the app to create internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_CREATE.label: create internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY.name: android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY
android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY.description: Allows the app to destroy internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY.label: destroy internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT.name: android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT
android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT.description: Allows the app to mount/unmount internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT.label: mount/unmount internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_RENAME.name: android.permission.ASEC_RENAME
android.permission.ASEC_RENAME.description: Allows the app to rename internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_RENAME.label: rename internal storage

android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.description: Allows the app to change network settings and to intercept and inspect all network traffic, for example to change the proxy and port of any APN. Malicious apps may monitor, redirect, or modify network packets without your knowledge.
android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.label: change/intercept network settings and traffic

android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.name: android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.description: Allows the app to get details about the currently synced feeds.
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.label: read subscribed feeds

android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.name: android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRITE
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.description: Allows the app to modify your currently synced feeds. Malicious apps may change your synced feeds.
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.label: write subscribed feeds

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.name: android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows the app to change the state of network connectivity.
android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.label: change network connectivity

android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE.name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE.description: Allows the app to free phone storage by deleting files in the cache directories of other applications. This may cause other applications to start up more slowly as they need to re-retrieve their data.
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE.label: delete all app cache data

android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.name: android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_PLAYBACK
android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.description: Allows the app to use any installed media decoder to decode for playback.
android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.label: use any media decoder for playback

android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.description: Allows the app to modify the system's secure settings data. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.label: modify secure system settings

android.permission.DUMP.name: android.permission.DUMP
android.permission.DUMP.description: Allows the app to retrieve internal state of the system. Malicious apps may retrieve a wide variety of private and secure information that they should never normally need.
android.permission.DUMP.label: retrieve system internal state

android.permission.READ_LOGS.name: android.permission.READ_LOGS
android.permission.READ_LOGS.description: Allows the app to read from the system's various log files. This allows it to discover general information about what you are doing with the phone, potentially including personal or private information.
android.permission.READ_LOGS.label: read sensitive log data

android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.name: android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP
android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.description: Allows the app to turn on debugging for another app. Malicious apps may use this to kill other apps.
android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.label: enable app debugging

android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.name: android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT
android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.description: Allows the app to control the maximum number of processes that will run. Never needed for normal apps.
android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.label: limit number of running processes

android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.name: android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH
android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.description: Allows the app to control whether activities are always finished as soon as they go to the background. Never needed for normal apps.
android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.label: force background apps to close

android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PRO.name: android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES
android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PRO.description: Allows the app to request that the supplied signal be sent to all persistent processes.
android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PRO.label: send Linux signals to apps

android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC.name: android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC
android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC.description: Allows the app to read and write to any resource owned by the diag group; for example, files in /dev. This could potentially affect system stability and security. This should be ONLY be used for hardware-specific diagnostics by the manufacturer or operator.
android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC.label: read/write to resources owned by diag

android.permission.STATUS_BAR.name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR
android.permission.STATUS_BAR.description: Allows the app to disable the status bar or add and remove system icons.
android.permission.STATUS_BAR.label: disable or modify status bar

android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE.name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE
android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE.description: Allows the app to be the status bar.
android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE.label: status bar

android.permission.FORCE_BACK.name: android.permission.FORCE_BACK
android.permission.FORCE_BACK.description: Allows the app to force any activity that is in the foreground to close and go back. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.FORCE_BACK.label: force app to close

android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.name: android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS
android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.description: Allows the app to modify collected battery statistics. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.label: modify battery statistics

android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS.name: android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS
android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS.description: Allows the app to retrieve collected application operation statistics. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS.label: retrieve app ops statistics

android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS.name: android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS
android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS.description: Allows the app to modify collected application operation statistics. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS.label: modify app ops statistics

android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.name: android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDOW
android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.description: Allows the app to create windows that are intended to be used by the internal system user interface. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.label: display unauthorized windows

android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS
android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.description: Allows the app to create and manage their own tokens, bypassing their normal Z-ordering. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.label: manage app tokens

android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN.name: android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN
android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN.description: Allows the application to temporarily freeze the screen for a full-screen transition.
android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN.label: freeze screen

android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS.name: android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS
android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS.description: Allows the app to deliver its own input events (key presses, etc.) to other apps. Malicious apps may use this to take over the phone.
android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS.label: press keys and control buttons

android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS.name: android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS
android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS.description: Allows an application to register an input filter which filters the stream of all user events before they are dispatched. Malicious app may control the system UI whtout user intervention.
android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS.label: filter events

android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_INFO.name: android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_INFO
android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_INFO.description: Allows an application to retrieve information about the the windows from the window manager. Malicious apps may retrieve information that is intended for internal system usage.
android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_INFO.label: retrieve window info

android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCE.name: android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCESSIBILITY
android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCE.description: Allows an application to temporarily enable accessibility on the device. Malicious apps may enable accessibility without user consent.
android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCE.label: temporary enable accessibility

android.permission.MAGNIFY_DISPLAY.name: android.permission.MAGNIFY_DISPLAY
android.permission.MAGNIFY_DISPLAY.description: Allows an application to magnify the content of a display. Malicious apps may transform the display content in a way that renders the device unusable.
android.permission.MAGNIFY_DISPLAY.label: magnify display

android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.name: android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER
android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.description: Allows the app to monitor and control how the system launches activities. Malicious apps may completely compromise the system. This permission is only needed for development, never for normal use.
android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.label: monitor and control all app launching

android.permission.SHUTDOWN.name: android.permission.SHUTDOWN
android.permission.SHUTDOWN.description: Puts the activity manager into a shutdown state. Does not perform a complete shutdown.
android.permission.SHUTDOWN.label: partial shutdown

android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.name: android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES
android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.description: Prevents the user from switching to another app.
android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.label: prevent app switches

android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO.name: android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO
android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO.description: Allows the holder to retrieve private information about the current application in the foreground of the screen.
android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO.label: get current app info

android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE.name: android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE
android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE.description: Allows the app to watch the keys you press even when interacting with another app (such as typing a password). Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE.label: record what you type and actions you take

android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.name: android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD
android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of an input method. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.label: bind to an input method

android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SE.name: android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SE.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of an accessibility service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SE.label: bind to an accessibility service

android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a text service(e.g. SpellCheckerService). Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.label: bind to a text service

android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a Vpn service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE.label: bind to a VPN service

android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.name: android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER
android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a wallpaper. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.label: bind to a wallpaper

android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.name: android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN
android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.description: Allows the holder to send intents to a device administrator. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.label: interact with a device admin

android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION.name: android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION
android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION.description: Allows the app to change the rotation of the screen at any time. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION.label: change screen orientation

android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED.name: android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED
android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED.description: Allows the app to change the mouse or trackpad pointer speed at any time. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED.label: change pointer speed

android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT.name: android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT
android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT.description: Allows the app to change the keyboard layout. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT.label: change keyboard layout

android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES.description: Allows the app to install new or updated Android packages. Malicious apps may use this to add new apps with arbitrarily powerful permissions.
android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES.label: directly install apps

android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.description: Allows the app to clear user data.
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.label: delete other apps' data

android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES.name: android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES
android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES.description: Allows the app to delete cache files.
android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES.label: delete other apps' caches

android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES
android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES.description: Allows the app to delete Android packages. Malicious apps may use this to delete important apps.
android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES.label: delete apps

android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE.name: android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE
android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE.description: Allows the app to move app resources from internal to external media and vice versa.
android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE.label: move app resources

android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENAB.name: android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENAB.description: Allows the app to change whether a component of another app is enabled or not. Malicious apps may use this to disable important phone capabilities. Care must be used with this permission, as it is possible to get app components into an unusable, inconsistent, or unstable state.
android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENAB.label: enable or disable app components

android.permission.GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSI.name: android.permission.GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSIONS
android.permission.GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSI.description: Allows an application to grant or revoke specific permissions for it or other applications. Malicious applications may use this to access features you have not granted them.
android.permission.GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSI.label: grant or revoke permissions

android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGER
android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGE.description: Allows the app to use SurfaceFlinger low-level features.
android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGE.label: access SurfaceFlinger

android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER.name: android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER
android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER.description: Allows the app to read the content of the frame buffer.
android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER.label: read frame buffer

android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLA.name: android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLAY
android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLA.description: Allows the app to configure and connect to Wifi displays.
android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLA.label: configure Wifi displays

android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY.name: android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY
android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY.description: Allows the app to control low-level features of Wifi displays.
android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY.label: control Wifi displays

android.permission.BRICK.name: android.permission.BRICK
android.permission.BRICK.description: Allows the app to disable the entire phone permanently. This is very dangerous.
android.permission.BRICK.label: permanently disable phone

android.permission.REBOOT.name: android.permission.REBOOT
android.permission.REBOOT.description: Allows the app to force the phone to reboot.
android.permission.REBOOT.label: force phone reboot

android.permission.DEVICE_POWER.name: android.permission.DEVICE_POWER
android.permission.DEVICE_POWER.description: Allows the app to turn the phone on or off.
android.permission.DEVICE_POWER.label: power phone on or off

android.permission.FACTORY_TEST.name: android.permission.FACTORY_TEST
android.permission.FACTORY_TEST.description: Run as a low-level manufacturer test, allowing complete access to the phone hardware. Only available when a phone is running in manufacturer test mode.
android.permission.FACTORY_TEST.label: run in factory test mode

android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REM.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED
android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REM.description: Allows the app to broadcast a notification that an app package has been removed. Malicious apps may use this to kill any other running app.
android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REM.label: send package removed broadcast

android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS
android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS.description: Allows the app to broadcast a notification that an SMS message has been received. Malicious apps may use this to forge incoming SMS messages.
android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS.label: send SMS-received broadcast

android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH
android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.description: Allows the app to broadcast a notification that a WAP PUSH message has been received. Malicious apps may use this to forge MMS message receipt or to silently replace the content of any webpage with malicious variants.
android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.label: send WAP-PUSH-received broadcast

android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR.name: android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR
android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR.description: Allows the app to completely reset the system to its factory settings, erasing all data, configuration, and installed apps.
android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR.label: reset system to factory defaults

android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.name: android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED
android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.description: Allows the app to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without your intervention. Malicious apps may place unnecessary and illegal calls to emergency services.
android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.label: directly call any phone numbers

android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIO.name: android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIONING
android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIO.description: Allows the app to start CDMA provisioning. Malicious apps may unnecessarily start CDMA provisioning.
android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIO.label: directly start CDMA phone setup

android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDA.name: android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES
android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDA.description: Allows the app to enable/disable location update notifications from the radio. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDA.label: control location update notifications

android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPER.name: android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES
android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPER.description: Allows the app read/write access to properties uploaded by the checkin service. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPER.label: access checkin properties

android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.name: android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS
android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.description: Allows the app to modify collected component usage statistics. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.label: update component usage statistics

android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.name: android.permission.BATTERY_STATS
android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.description: Allows an application to read the current low-level battery use data. May allow the application to find out detailed information about which apps you use.
android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.label: read battery statistics

android.permission.BACKUP.name: android.permission.BACKUP
android.permission.BACKUP.description: Allows the app to control the system's backup and restore mechanism. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.BACKUP.label: control system backup and restore

android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP.name: android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP
android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP.description: Allows the app to launch the full backup confirmation UI. Not to be used by any app.
android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP.label: confirm a full backup or restore operation

android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.name: android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS
android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a widget service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.label: bind to a widget service

android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.name: android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET
android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.description: Allows the app to tell the system which widgets can be used by which app. An app with this permission can give access to personal data to other apps. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.label: choose widgets

android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DAT.name: android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DATA_SETTING
android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DAT.description: Allows the app to change the background data usage setting.
android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DAT.label: change background data usage setting

android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYST.name: android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYSTEM
android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYST.description: Allows the app to read and write the cache filesystem.
android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYST.label: access the cache filesystem

android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HI.name: android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HISTORY
android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HI.description: Allows the app to read historical network usage for specific networks and apps.
android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HI.label: read historical network usage

android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY.name: android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY
android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY.description: Allows the app to manage network policies and define app-specific rules.
android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY.label: manage network policy

android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUN.name: android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUNTING
android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUN.description: Allows the app to modify how network usage is accounted against apps. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUN.label: modify network usage accounting

android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_.name: android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_AGENT
android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_.description: Allows the app to verify a package is installable.
android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_.label: verify packages

android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER.name: android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER
android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER.description: Allows the holder to make requests of package verifiers. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER.label: bind to a package verifier

android.permission.SERIAL_PORT.name: android.permission.SERIAL_PORT
android.permission.SERIAL_PORT.description: Allows the holder to access serial ports using the SerialManager API.
android.permission.SERIAL_PORT.label: access serial ports

android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVID.name: android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVIDERS_EXTERNALLY
android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVID.description: Allows the holder to access content providers from the shell. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVID.label: access content providers externally

android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK.name: android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK
android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK.description: Allows the holder to offer information to the system about when would be a good time for a noninteractive reboot to upgrade the device.
android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK.label: discourage automatic device updates

android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS.name: android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS
android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS.description: Allows the app to retrieve, examine, and clear notifications, including those posted by other apps.
android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS.label: access notifications

android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LIS.name: android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LIS.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a notification listener service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LIS.label: bind to a notification listener service
